name: Donquixote Rosinante
text: Opponent's Turn: If 1 of your blue (Navy) type Characters would be removed from the field by your opponent's effect, you may rest this Character and trash 1 card from your hand instead.

effect.text: If 1 of your blue (Navy) type Characters would be removed from the field by your opponent's effect, you may rest this Character and trash 1 card from your hand instead.
